original_title: Ukrainian arrested in Italy over Nord Stream sabotage – German prosecutors — RT World News
article_summary: The US has for the first time refused to endorse a UN condemnation of Russia for the 2008 war with Georgia, a move criticized by Georgian officials as a sign of deteriorating US-Georgia relations. Meanwhile, the US plan to build a fleet of naval drones, aimed at countering China, is reportedly facing technical issues and management turmoil.</s>
